title: Autopsy raises new questions in death of man found by family day later
body: A mystery is deepening around the death of a 33-year-old father of five along a northwest Baltimore County highway last year.Marcus Nix's body was found in August alongside an offramp from Interstate 795. New information is only leaving his family more frustrated and looking for a resolution.Towanda Teaster and Ashley Leonard retraced their steps from August, when they discovered the Nix's body. Nix was Teaster's son and Leonard's fiancee."His hands were by his side, straight out ... with his face turned ... and just laid straight out," Teaster
